title: Data Visualization
description: Building interactive dashboards and reports, advanced data visualizations, and custom charts to deliver actionable insights that drive business decisions.

title: Data Modeling & Analysis
description: Designing robust data models, integrating multiple data sources, performing data cleansing, and uncovering trends to support business decisions.

title: Business Intelligence Solutions
description: Translating business requirements into BI solutions, automating reporting processes, and enabling self-service analytics for stakeholders.

title: Data Integration
description: Connecting and blending data from SQL databases, Excel, cloud platforms, and APIs to create unified analytics environments.
